sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; import ReactDOM from 'react-dom'; import './index.css'; const Header=(props)=>

{props.course}

const Content=(props)=>

{props.part} {props.exercise}

const Total=(props)=>

{props.part} {props.exercise}

const App=()=> { const course = 'Half Stack application development' const part1 = 'Fundamentals of React' const exercises1 = 10 const part2 = 'Using props to pass data' const exercises2 = 7 const part3 = 'State of a component' const exercises3 = 14 return(
< Header course={course}/> < Content part={part2} exercise={exercises2} /> < Total part={part3} exercise={exercises3}/>

Total number of exercise is {exercises1 + exercises2 + exercises3}

) } ReactDOM.render( , document.getElementById('root') );
